overview: The lore apostle tells that a group of people with abilities have been slaughtered. After a bloody battle, the surviving little girl is saved as a foster daughter by the organization’s boss. Time passed by, the little girl in the past was already slim, in order not to let the tragedy repeat the girl decided to become a killer, met the high-cool male captain, in the hone, the handsome man and the girl sparked, and the girl’s ability gradually awakened, seeing To reach the peak of life, the conspiracy that was shrouded in the moment when the whole family was slaughtered gradually emerged.
title: Evil Assassin
